title: Why is it that in Horror movies the victims split up?
body:
This is one of the worst tropes in movies: 

a group of people are being stalked by a killer and they split up, allowing the killer to murder them one by one 

I was watching Hollow Man  (2000) which is like science fiction horror, and towards the end the victims are trapped in an underground lab and decide to split up, allowing the killer to kill them one at a time. 

Horror movies are dumb in general, but this takes the cake.
